reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (2.0 ANGSTROMS) OF 108-390 IN COMPLEX WITH CADM1

comment.text: Tumor suppressor that inhibits cell proliferation and promotes apoptosis. Modulates the activity of protein arginine N-methyltransferases, including PRMT3 and PRMT5.
Interacts (via FERM domain) with CADM1. Interacts with PRMT3, PRMT5 and PRMT6.
Detected in the cytoplasm of actively dividing cells.
Expressed at high levels in brain, with lower levels in kidney, intestine, and testis. Detected in lung.

comment.name: Atlas of Genetics and Cytogenetics in Oncology and Haematology

property.value: Expressed in substantia nigra and 238 other tissues
P:protein localization to juxtaparanode region of axon
P:protein localization to paranode region of axon

feature.description: N-acetylthreonine; in Band 4.1-like protein 3, N-terminally processed
